QuestData.Title: Investigate the Crash
QuestData.Description: When I was wounded in the wastes I saw a goblin zeppelin crash. It went down to the northwest, beyond the Expedition Armory. $B$BThe zeppelin was on fire. Shrieking, burning goblins were falling like bombs from the sky. Of course I was in a lot of pain and I had lost a lot of blood. I may have imagined the whole thing.$B$BIf you can find any survivors, we can offer them sanctuary here at Spinebreaker Post.
QuestData.RewardText: We were shot down by the Burning Legion, even though we waved a flag of truce. Who knew the Burning Legion was so mean? $B$BWe cannot come with you to Spinebreaker Post. We need to repair our zeppelin and be on our way.
